include/lighttpd/chunk.h

00001 #ifndef _CHUNK_H_
00002 #define _CHUNK_H_
00003 
00004 #include "buffer.h"
00005 #include "array.h"
00006 #include "sys-mmap.h"
00007 
00008 typedef struct chunk {
00009         enum { UNUSED_CHUNK, MEM_CHUNK, FILE_CHUNK } type;
00010 
00011         buffer *mem; /* either the storage of the mem-chunk or the read-ahead buffer */
00012 
00013         struct {
00014                 /* filechunk */
00015                 buffer *name; /* name of the file */
00016                 off_t  start; /* starting offset in the file */
00017                 off_t  length; /* octets to send from the starting offset */
00018 
00019                 int    fd;
00020                 struct {
00021                         char   *start; /* the start pointer of the mmap'ed area */
00022                         size_t length; /* size of the mmap'ed area */
00023                         off_t  offset; /* start is <n> octets away from the start of the file */
00024                 } mmap;
00025 
00026                 int is_temp; /* file is temporary and will be deleted on cleanup */
00027 
00028                 struct {
00029                         int fd;
00030                         off_t length;
00031                         off_t offset;
00032                 } copy;
00033         } file;
00034 
00035         off_t  offset; /* octets sent from this chunk
00036                           the size of the chunk is either
00037                           - mem-chunk: mem->used - 1
00038                           - file-chunk: file.length
00039                         */
00040 
00041         struct {
00042                 off_t written;
00043                 int ret_val;
00044         } async;
00045 
00046         struct chunk *next;
00047 } chunk;
00048 
00049 typedef struct {
00050         chunk *first;
00051         chunk *last;
00052 
00053         array *tempdirs;
00054 
00055         int is_closed;   /* the input to this CQ is closed */
00056 
00057         off_t  bytes_in, bytes_out;
00058 } chunkqueue;
00059

00065 LI_API int chunkqueue_append_mem(chunkqueue *c, const char *mem, size_t len);
00066 LI_API int chunkqueue_append_buffer(chunkqueue *c, buffer *mem);
00067 LI_API int chunkqueue_prepend_buffer(chunkqueue *c, buffer *mem);
00068 
00069 LI_API buffer * chunkqueue_get_append_buffer(chunkqueue *c);
00070 LI_API buffer * chunkqueue_get_prepend_buffer(chunkqueue *c);
00071 LI_API chunk * chunkqueue_get_append_tempfile(chunkqueue *cq);
00072 LI_API int chunkqueue_steal_tempfile(chunkqueue *cq, chunk *in);
